=== About Me ===

A Linux user since 2009, started with ubuntu 9.04. I have since moved between Fedora, cent os and  Ubuntu. 
I have been an occasional programmer since 2007, professionally since 2009 . I have worked small apps in C/C++ and Java (GUI). I also work with CSS, JS and Bash scripting. I am a final year undergrad in Information Technology.
